book.synopsis: Rose Daniels flees her nightmare marriage to find refuge in a strange city, far from her brutal husband, Norman, whose relentless savagery and mad obsessions follow her to her sanctuary and drive her to transform herself to survive.
book.title_long: El retrato de Rose Madder (Spanish Edition)
book.dimensions: height: 170 mm, length: 108 mm, width: 35 mm, weight: 286 g
